scenario_text.value:
Hey, Saki. Out on a walk to clear your head
or something?

Yeah, basically. Being cooped up indoors all
the time gets me feeling down, you know?

Hey, why don’t you ask Takuma what he does
when he needs to clear his head?
Oh, good idea! Any tips, Takuma?
What? You mean right now?
(Hmm, I wonder?)

(No point in mentioning methods that can’t be
used in this world...)

(What can I suggest for shaking the cobwebs
out?)
(What’s my recommendation?)
A nice, cool breeze?
A good talk?
A good scream?

Um, how about...feeling a nice, cool
breeze hit your face?
You mean what I’m doing right now?
Huh? Oh, yeah. I guess you are.

What am I supposed to do with that
suggestion?!
Sorry...

Why don’t you talk with everyone? Like Aoi,
or Floramon here.

Normally that would make for a good
distraction, but...

Everyone’s worried about what’s about to
happen to us, right?

So whatever we talk about would just make
everyone feel worse.
Yeah, I bet they’d all get depressed.
Right?! Man, I’m totally stumped.

Getting your mind off of stuff is pretty
tough, isn’t it?
A good scream?
Scream about what?
I think anything’s okay. Just let ’er rip.
Would making a bunch of noise do any good?
...I guess not.

Pretty interesting answer, considering we
asked you randomly like that.

Yeah, I’m surprised. I’ll try your idea next
time!
Next time? Not now?

If I do it now, it might scare the little
ones, you know?

If I get a chance to head to the beach or
something, I’ll give it a shot then.

(She seems a bit happier than before. That’s
good.)

I saw the professor heading that way earlier.
I think he left the school.
He did? Must be looking into something again.

Maybe he’s just taking a breather like me.
Everyone needs some alone time, right?
You got that right... Thanks, anyway.
